cast.overview: Rudy grew up in a steel mill town where most people ended up working, but wanted to play football at Notre Dame instead. There were only a couple of problems. His grades were a little low, his athletic skills were poor, and he was only half the size of the other players. But he had the drive and the spirit of 5 people and has set his sights upon joining the team.
cast.title: Rudy

details.biography: Robert J Steinmiller was born on July 29, 1978 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA, and he has acted in all three venues of the acting profession: THEATRICAL, MOTION PICTURE, and TELEVISION. He began his acting career in 1989 in a Theatrical production of Les Miserables. He starred in several Motion Pictures in the early 1990's including Bingo (1991), Rudy (1993) and The Ref (1994). He appeared on Television in an episode of The Untouchables, and several McDonalds commercials. In 2001 Robert returned to the stage in a Theatrical production of "Damn Yankees" at the Madrid Theatre, LA, USA.
details.name: Robert J. Steinmiller Jr.
